synopsis.text:
Crown Handler, the second installment in the Princess Principal movie series, brings a thrilling tale of royal intrigue and high-stakes espionage. After a failed assassination attempt on King Richard, the threat to the royal family is far from over. Princess Mary, next in line to the throne, becomes the target of relentless assassins.

Tasked with the dual responsibility of safeguarding Princess Mary and locating deadly Cavorite bombs, Team White Pigeon faces a formidable challenge. The situation becomes even more complex when it's revealed that Ange, a key member of Team White Pigeon, is none other than Princess Charlotte, Mary's sister, in disguise.

As the clock ticks down and the stakes escalate, Team White Pigeon must navigate a dangerous web of fanaticism and treachery. Will they succeed in their mission, or will the royal lineage fall victim to the nefarious plot? The race against time begins in this explosive chapter of Princess Principal: Crown Handler.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
